name: Inglés intermedio nivel 1
description: 6 out of 7 students have enrolled in the Enskill Simulations.

simulation.name: Jerry’s Spaghetti
simulation.description:
CEFR Statements / Students can:

  • Understand what people say to me in simple, everyday conversation.
  • Communicate in everyday situations.
  • Politely talk to people in short social exchanges.
